Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I get closer and flip my luxurious hair around.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Before I finish my sentence, Bucketina stumbles and trips.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: The liquid from her head spills out of her and onto me, completely filling my body.

Name: Bucketina-Chan
Story: 'Oh no no no! I'm so sorry Cursor-Kun! Are you ok?'
